languages.text: "Обыски в губернаторском дворце окончились пожаром, который, к сожалению или счастью, был потушен прежде, чем уничтожил резиденцию. В пламени сгинули сотни слуг, однако Инквизиция обнаружила следы еретических ритуалов и начала розыск губернатора".

"The search of the governor's palace was interrupted by a fire, which, for better or worse, was extinguished before it could destroy the residence. Hundreds of servants perished in the flames. However, the Inquisition still managed to discover traces of heretical rituals and have started their search for the governor."
languages.original_text: "Обыски в губернаторском дворце окончились пожаром, который, к сожалению или счастью, был потушен прежде, чем уничтожил резиденцию. В пламени сгинули сотни слуг, однако Инквизиция обнаружила следы еретических ритуалов и начала розыск губернатора".

traits.locale_text: "The search of the Governor's Palace had been interrupted by a fire that, for better or worse was extinguished before destroying the residence. Hundreds of servants have died in the flames, but the Inquisition had discovered traces of heretical rituals and started their search for the Governor."

"The search of the Governor's Palace had been interrupted by a fire that, for better or worse was extinguished before destroying the residence. Hundreds of servants have died in the flames, but the Inquisition had discovered traces of heretical rituals and started their search for the Governor."

"The search of the governor's palace was interrupted by a fire, which, for better or worse, was extinguished before it could destroy the residence. Hundreds of servants perished in the flames. However, the Inquisition still managed to discover traces of heretical rituals and have started their search for the governor."

"The search of the governor's palace was interrupted by a fire, which, for better or worse, was extinguished before it could destroy the residence. Hundreds of servants perished in the flames. However, the Inquisition still managed to discover traces of heretical rituals and have started their search for the governor."

"The search of the governor's palace was interrupted by a fire, which, for better or worse, was extinguished before it could destroy the residence. Hundreds of servants perished in the flames. However, the Inquisition still managed to discover traces of heretical rituals and have started their search for the governor."

"The search of the governor's palace was interrupted by a fire, which, for better or worse, was extinguished before it could destroy the residence. Hundreds of servants perished in the flames. However, the Inquisition still managed to discover traces of heretical rituals and have started their search for the governor."

languages.text: “针对总督府邸的搜查由于大火中断，但您的仆人赶在大火烧毁整座总督府邸之前将其顺利扑灭，几百名仆人在大火中丧命。但即便如此，审判庭依然发现了异端仪式的痕迹，开始搜寻总督的下落。”
languages.original_text: "The search of the governor's palace was interrupted by a fire, which, for better or worse, was extinguished before it could destroy the residence. Hundreds of servants perished in the flames. However, the Inquisition still managed to discover traces of heretical rituals and have started their search for the governor."

traits.locale_text: “针对总督府邸的搜查由于大火中断，但您的仆人赶在大火烧毁整座总督府邸之前将其顺利扑灭，几百名仆人在大火中丧命。但即便如此，审判庭依然发现了异端仪式的痕迹，开始搜寻总督的下落。”
“针对总督府邸的搜查由于大火中断。但即便如此，在整座总督府邸被彻底烧毁之前，大火已经被扑灭了。几百名仆人在大火中丧命，而审判庭也发现了异端仪式的痕迹，开始搜寻总督的下落。”

languages.text: «La búsqueda del palacio de la gobernadora se ha visto interrumpida por un incendio que, para bien o para mal, se extinguió antes de destruir la residencia. Cientos de sirvientes murieron en las llamas. Aun así, la Inquisición logró descubrir rastros de rituales heréticos, por lo que han dado comienzo a la búsqueda de la gobernadora».
languages.original_text: "The search of the governor's palace was interrupted by a fire, which, for better or worse, was extinguished before it could destroy the residence. Hundreds of servants perished in the flames. However, the Inquisition still managed to discover traces of heretical rituals and have started their search for the governor."

traits.locale_text: «La búsqueda del palacio de la gobernadora se ha visto interrumpida por un incendio que, para bien o para mal, se extinguió antes de destruir la residencia. Cientos de sirvientes murieron en las llamas. Aun así, la Inquisición logró descubrir rastros de rituales heréticos, por lo que han dado comienzo a la búsqueda de la gobernadora».

languages.text: 「総督の宮殿の捜索は火災によって阻まれました。良くも悪くも、居住部分を破壊する前に火は消し止められたのですが、何百人もの従者が死亡しました。異端儀式の痕跡を見つかって、異端審問庁は総督の捜索を進めています」
languages.original_text: "The search of the governor's palace was interrupted by a fire, which, for better or worse, was extinguished before it could destroy the residence. Hundreds of servants perished in the flames. However, the Inquisition still managed to discover traces of heretical rituals and have started their search for the governor."

traits.locale_text: 「総督の宮殿の捜索は、良くも悪くも、火災によって阻まれました。居住部分を破壊する前に火は消し止められたのですが、何百人もの従者が死亡しました。異端審問庁は依然として、異端儀式の痕跡を発見しようと総督の捜索を進めています」
「総督の宮殿の捜索は、良くも悪くも、火災によって阻まれました。居住部分を破壊する前に火は消し止められたのですが、何百人もの従者が死亡しました。異端審問庁は依然として、異端儀式の痕跡を発見しようと総督の捜索を進めています」

languages.text: « La fouille du palais a été interrompue par un incendie circonscrit avant la destruction totale des lieux, mais des centaines de serviteurs ont trouvé la mort dans les flammes. Malgré tout, l'Inquisition est parvenue à trouver des traces de rituels hérétiques et s'est lancée à la poursuite de la gouverneure. »
languages.original_text: "The search of the governor's palace was interrupted by a fire, which, for better or worse, was extinguished before it could destroy the residence. Hundreds of servants perished in the flames. However, the Inquisition still managed to discover traces of heretical rituals and have started their search for the governor."

traits.locale_text: « La fouille du palais a été interrompue par un incendie circonscrit avant la destruction totale des lieux, mais des centaines de serviteurs ont trouvé la mort dans les flammes. Malgré tout, l'Inquisition est parvenue à trouver des traces de rituels hérétiques et s'est lancée à la poursuite de la gouverneure. »

languages.text: "Die Durchsuchung des Gouverneurspalasts wurde durch ein Feuer gestört, das allerdings gelöscht werden konnte, ehe es die Residenz zerstören konnte. Hunderte von Dienern ließen in den Flammen ihr Leben. Die Inquisition entdeckte dennoch Spuren ketzerischer Rituale und machte sich auf die Suche nach der Gouverneurin."
languages.original_text: "The search of the governor's palace was interrupted by a fire, which, for better or worse, was extinguished before it could destroy the residence. Hundreds of servants perished in the flames. However, the Inquisition still managed to discover traces of heretical rituals and have started their search for the governor."

traits.locale_text: "Die Durchsuchung des Gouverneurspalasts wurde durch ein Feuer gestört, das allerdings gelöscht werden konnte, ehe es die Residenz zerstören konnte. Hunderte von Dienern ließen in den Flammen ihr Leben. Die Inquisition entdeckte dennoch Spuren ketzerischer Rituale und machte sich auf die Suche nach der Gouverneurin."

"Die Durchsuchung des Gouverneurspalasts wurde durch ein Feuer unterbrochen. Es konnte gelöscht werden, ehe es die Residenz zerstört und Hunderte von Dienern getötet hat. Die Inquisition konnte Spuren ketzerischer Rituale finden und hat begonnen, nach der Gouverneurin zu suchen."

languages.text: "Valinin sarayındaki arayışa bir yangın engel oldu. Yangın, konutu yok etmeden önce öyle ya da böyle söndürüldü. Yüzlerce hizmetkâr ise yangında can verdi. Bu sırada Engizisyon, kâfirce ayinlerin izlerini keşfetmeye devam ediyor, valiyi aramak için kendi girişimlerini de başlattılar."
languages.original_text: "The search of the governor's palace was interrupted by a fire, which, for better or worse, was extinguished before it could destroy the residence. Hundreds of servants perished in the flames. However, the Inquisition still managed to discover traces of heretical rituals and have started their search for the governor."

traits.locale_text: "Valinin sarayındaki arayışa bir yangın engel oldu. Yangın, konutu yok etmeden önce öyle ya da böyle söndürüldü. Yüzlerce hizmetkâr ise yangında can verdi. Bu sırada Engizisyon, kâfirce ayinlerin izlerini keşfetmeye devam ediyor, valiyi aramak için kendi girişimlerini de başlattılar."
